remarks: Two source points map to the same destination point under a group homomorphism iff their difference belongs to the kernel.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 31-Dec-2014.)
statement:
ghmeqker.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
ghmeqker.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` T ) $.
ghmeqker.k $e |- K = ( `' F " { .0. } ) $.
ghmeqker.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` S ) $.
ghmeqker $p |- ( ( F e. ( S GrpHom T ) /\ U e. B /\ V e. B ) -> ( ( F ` U ) = ( F ` V ) <-> ( U .- V ) e. K ) ) $.
